rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0090
rows.name:
Don't just stand there! Push back!
We can't let them get close![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0001_02
rows.name: Even our Skells are powerless before them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Continuing to persist here is meaningless.
It will only serve to thin our ranks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0003
rows.name:
After all this time, we've finally found
a clue that may lead us to the Great One...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
With respect, the phenomenon space surrounding
this planet is only 800 exedits in diameter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Three days at light speed is
more than enough to scour it thoroughly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
If the Great One or the Samaar Federation homeland were
here, don't you think we would have found something by now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's one thing to engage the enemy all the way out
near that forsaken chunk of rock they call Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0009
rows.name:
But then, to be swallowed up by that strange light and
dumped off here, in this primordial hellhole? Are we cursed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0010
rows.name: And trapped with humans, of all things...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's like some sick joke.
If someone told me this was death, I'd believe them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0012
rows.name: All the more reason to persist![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0013
rows.name:
We must retrieve it if we ever hope to
escape the confines of this phenomenon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0014
rows.name: Grandmaster Luxaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0015
rows.name: Speak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0016
rows.name: I bring news...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0018
rows.name: Really. And he can be trusted...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0019
rows.name: Most interesting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG0020
rows.name: Yes, a most interesting proposal, indeed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06010100_MSG9000
rows.name: —Ganglion Flagship—[ST:wait ]
